verbs.description: Amid [V: escalating] [ARG1: tensions] with some of America ’s closest allies , a defiant President Trump barreled his way into international talks Friday at the annual Group of Seven summit .

[ARGM-LOC: Amid escalating tensions with some of America ’s closest allies] , [ARG0: a defiant President Trump] [V: barreled] [ARGM-DIR: his way] [ARG1: into international talks] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARGM-LOC: at the annual Group of Seven summit] .
